welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gurnee, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and family-friendly attractions. Get ready to explore and experience all that Gurnee has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your time here!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, there is a separate terminal with luxurious lounges and concierge services available.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.
